job.title: Senior Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: Key projects:•&nbsp;As a Senior Site Reliability Engineer, you will be responsible for the day-to-day maintenance, operational support, and reliability of Internet-based and in-store systems.•&nbsp;On an on­going basis, this position will help identify root causes of operational issues and partner with other team members to drive resolution.      Daily Responsibilities:•&nbsp;Provide break/fix, customer support, and communication to product teams•&nbsp;Create and manage Service Level Indicators (SLIs), and Service Level Objectives (SLOs) using New Relic, and Splunk• Resolve performance bottlenecks using data from monitoring tools, and profiling utilities like dotTrace, dotMemory, and PerfView•&nbsp;Manage configuration of monitoring, and alerting in New Relic, Splunk, and Pager Duty•&nbsp;Implement OS, and application changes as needed using Chef and Jenkins•&nbsp;Create and maintain system, process, and training documentation• Drive root cause analysis and post-mortem as needed•&nbsp;Conduct monthly OS patching and deploy OS, application, and infrastructure changes      Qualifications:•&nbsp;4-6+ years supporting external, customer-facing web services for a large site•&nbsp;4-6+ years installing, configuring, and troubleshooting Windows-based systems and services using IIS and MSSQL• 2-3+ years using Chef to manage servers in Windows environment•&nbsp;2-3+ years using Splunk, New Relic, and Pager Duty in a large, customer-facing environment•&nbsp;2-3+ years managing VIPs, pools, and members on F5 Big IP•&nbsp;Outstanding troubleshooting, attention to detail, written and spoken communication skills.•&nbsp;Experience defining and using Service Level Indicators (SLIs), and Service Level Objectives (SLOs)
